title: Next.js security advisory (AV25-162)
description: On March 22, 2025, Next.js published a security advisory to address a critical vulnerability in the following product:
affected_note:
Next.js  15.x versions prior to 15.2.3
Next.js  14.x versions prior to 14.2.25
Next.js  13.x versions prior to 13.5.9
Next.js  12.x versions prior to 12.3.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
